item.title: Sunday data/statistics link roundup (12/9/12)
item.description: Some interesting data/data visualizations about working conditions in the apparel industry. Here is the full report. Whenever I see reports like this, I wish the raw data were more clearly linked. I want to be able to get in, play with the data, and see if I notice something that doesn’t appear in the infographics.Â This is an awesome plain-language discussion of how a bunch of methods (CS and Stats) with fancy names relate to each other.
